name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Kuma Appears at Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma makes his dramatic entrance at Thriller Bark, appearing behind Perona at the Thousand Sunny. His presence immediately terrifies Perona and her subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Kuma's first appearance at Thriller Bark, establishing him as a major threat and wild card in the arc.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Nikyu Nikyu no Mi at Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: Kuma removes his glove and uses the power of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi to instantly vanish Perona with a single touch of his paw pads, demonstrating his overwhelming abilities.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Kuma's Devil Fruit powers at Thriller Bark, instantly defeating a previously formidable opponent.

keyMoments.title: Kuma Inquires About Luffy's Brother
keyMoments.description: Kuma cryptically asks Nami if Monkey D. Luffy has a brother, specifically mentioning Ace, before vanishing without explanation.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that Kuma and possibly the World Government have knowledge of and interest in Luffy's connection to Ace, foreshadowing major future events.
keyMoments.quote: If Monkey D. Luffy has a brother...

bounties.reason: Former bounty before becoming a Warlord

abilities.description: Kuma can repel anything he touches with his paw pads, including living beings, causing them to vanish instantly.

relationships.description: Kuma effortlessly defeats Perona with his Devil Fruit powers.

evolutionMoments.description: Kuma uses his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi to make Perona vanish instantly.

relationships.description: Kuma encounters Nami at the Thousand Sunny and questions her about Luffy's brother before leaving peacefully.

evolutionMoments.description: Kuma questions Nami about whether Luffy has a brother, specifically asking about Ace.

reveals.information: First demonstration of Nikyu Nikyu no Mi powers at Thriller Bark
Kuma has knowledge of or interest in Luffy's brother Ace

keyMoments.title: Nami Defeats Twin Squirrel Zombies
keyMoments.description: Nami aggressively pursues and defeats twin squirrel zombies who took her treasure, demonstrating her determination to recover what's hers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's continued growth as a fighter and her fierce protectiveness over treasure.

keyMoments.title: Nami Encounters Bartholomew Kuma
keyMoments.description: Nami arrives at the Thousand Sunny expecting to confront Perona, but instead finds the mysterious and terrifying Bartholomew Kuma.
keyMoments.significance: Places Nami in direct danger with one of the World Government's most powerful agents.

keyMoments.title: Nami Answers Kuma's Questions About Ace
keyMoments.description: Kuma questions Nami about whether Luffy has a brother. After confirming she's a Straw Hat crew member, Nami answers his cryptic inquiry about Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Nami unknowingly provides information to a World Government agent about Luffy's connection to Ace.

relationships.description: Nami encounters Kuma at the Thousand Sunny and provides information about Luffy and Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Nami meets Kuma for the first time and answers his questions about Luffy's brother.

keyMoments.title: Perona Encounters Bartholomew Kuma
keyMoments.description: Perona is shocked and terrified when Bartholomew Kuma appears behind her at the Thousand Sunny. She recognizes him as one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Perona's defeat and disappearance from Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Perona Defeated by Kuma
keyMoments.description: After launching her ultimate combo attack, Perona is instantly and effortlessly defeated when Kuma removes his glove and uses his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi powers to make her vanish.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power difference between Perona and elite-level threats like Kuma. Removes her from Thriller Bark entirely.

relationships.description: Perona attempts to fight Kuma but is instantly defeated by his overwhelming power.

evolutionMoments.description: Kuma effortlessly defeats Perona with his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi, sending her away from Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Develops Strategy Against Oars
keyMoments.description: Usopp realizes that since Oars has Luffy's shadow, he also shares Luffy's personality traits and weaknesses. He develops a strategy to use meat as bait to distract Oars.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's tactical intelligence and deep understanding of his captain's character.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Tests Shusui in Battle
keyMoments.description: Zoro decides to test Shusui, the legendary sword he acquired after defeating Ryuma, using it in combat against Oars.
keyMoments.significance: First combat use of Shusui, one of Zoro's most important weapons throughout the series.
